elements.name: question1
Frage 1
rows: 1. if the tax burden is distributed according to the red line, the highest earners pay less than if it is distributed according to the green line.
2. if the tax burden is distributed according to the blue curve, people with no income do not have to pay any taxes at all.
3. if the tax burden is distributed according to the red line, then the state redistribution is greater than if it is distributed according to the green line.
4 If the tax burden is distributed according to the blue line, the state redistribution is always greater than if it is distributed according to the red line.
5 A distribution of the tax burden along the green line is the fairest distribution of the tax burden according to the Swiss Federal Constitution.
elements.title: Check the appropriate box for each statement.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: In case 5, give brief and precise reasons for your decision.
elements.correctAnswer: The ability-to-pay principle, which is enshrined in the Federal Constitution, cannot be implemented with a capitation tax, because those with higher incomes would not pay more tax than those with lower incomes.
